title: Top 10 trending phones of week 44
description: There was a series of high-profile announcements this week and even though it's going to be months before some of the phones go global everyone was paying attention. The Xiaomi 15 Pro ended up as the most popular phone in our database in week 44, just edging another Snapdragon 8 Elite newcomer - the Oneplus 13. Last week's champion, the Samsung Galaxy A55, had to settle for third, while the Galaxy S24 Ultra dropped to fourth position. text: There was a series of high-profile announcements this week and even though it's going to be months before some of the phones go global everyone was paying attention. The Xiaomi 15 Pro ended up as the most popular phone in our database in week 44, just edging another Snapdragon 8 Elite newcomer - the Oneplus 13. Last week's champion, the Samsung Galaxy A55, had to settle for third, while the Galaxy S24 Ultra dropped to fourth position. Another new face came in seventh - the Honor Magic 7 Pro. It is followed by the Galaxy A15 that slipped to eight position. Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max is down to ninth as the Redmi Note 13 completes this week's edition of the trending chart. Join us next week as we see where the new phones will end once the dust settles.
html:
There was a series of high-profile announcements this week and even though it's going to be months before some of the phones go global everyone was paying attention.

The Xiaomi 15 Pro ended up as the most popular phone in our database in week 44, just edging another Snapdragon 8 Elite newcomer - the Oneplus 13.

Last week's champion, the Samsung Galaxy A55, had to settle for third, while the Galaxy S24 Ultra dropped to fourth position.

Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 12GB RAM$ 789.99$ 1,049.99
512GB 12GB RAM$ 857.69$ 1,049.99
Show all prices

The vanilla Xiaomi 15 sits in fifth ahead of the Redmi Note 13 Pro that somehow retained its sixth spot amidst all the chaos.

Another new face came in seventh - the Honor Magic 7 Pro. It is followed by the Galaxy A15 that slipped to eight position.

Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max is down to ninth as the Redmi Note 13 completes this week's edition of the trending chart.

Join us next week as we see where the new phones will end once the dust settles.
